# Zettapark

[![zettapark-ci](https://github.com/clickzetta/zettapark/actions/workflows/ci.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/clickzetta/zettapark/actions/workflows/ci.yml)

## Overview

Zettapark is a Python library for working with data in ClickZetta.

## Installation

```bash
pip install clickzetta-zettapark-python
```
